oai_dc:dc.dc:title: John Best and Daughters
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Edwin Best
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greenback (Tenn.); Best, Anna Elizabeth; Best, John; Best, Nora Ellen;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A man and two young children in a field with flowers. A wire fence is behind them. The school building was built in 1921 so this picture was taken before that. Nora and Anna Elizabeth were born in March 1919.
